mapper.select: SELECT /* com.theshoes.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectMemberById() */ A.MEMBER_ID , A.NAME , A.PWD , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE_NO , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.BLACK_REASON , A.BLACKLIST_YN , A.WITHDRAW_YN , A.BIRTH , A.ROLE FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.BLACKLIST_YN = 'N' AND A.WITHDRAW_YN = 'N' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ id }

SELECT /* com.theshoes.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectMemberByEmail() */ A.MEMBER_ID , A.NAME , A.PWD , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE_NO , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.BLACK_REASON , A.BLACKLIST_YN , A.WITHDRAW_YN , A.BIRTH , A.ROLE FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.BLACKLIST_YN = 'N' AND A.EMAIL = #{ email }

SELECT /* com.theshoes.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectAllWishList() */ B.WISH_NO , D.SHOES_CATEGORY_NAME , C.SHOES_MODEL , C.SHOES_PRICE , E.SAVED_NAME FROM MEMBER A LEFT JOIN WISHLIST B ON (A.MEMBER_ID = B.WISH_ID) LEFT JOIN SHOES_INFO C ON (B.WISH_NO = C.SHOES_NO) LEFT JOIN SHOES_CATEGORY D ON(C.INFO_CATEGORY_NO = D.SHOES_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN SHOES_THUMB E ON (C.SHOES_NO = E.ST_NO) WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ id } AND E.FILE_TYPE = 'TITLE'
